column3: Heavensturn is a chance anew, yes? I am thinking it is like the game─rock, silk, claw.
The hand is coming up, the hand is making shapes, the hand is winning, losing, or tying. Every Heavensturn, the hand is coming up. Chance, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>m'lady<Else/>m'lord</If>, chance.
You are losing the crimson uma kabuto? Sometimes, I am thinking you are not very smart.
Does <If(PlayerParameter(4))>m'lady<Else/>m'lord</If> sniffle? Another one in your hands, I am thinking, will dry those tears.
